attributes.exportSql:
select a.id,c.name,c.number,d.name depName,e.name parentDepName,f.name jobName,g.name orgName,h.name labourCorName,
a.wtpwgsFee,a.sharedFee,a.paidRoomFee,a.damageFee,a.rewardFee,a.punishFee,isnull(a.wtpwgsFee,0)+isnull(a.sharedFee,0)+isnull(a.paidRoomFee,0)+isnull(a.damageFee,0)-isnull(a.rewardFee,0) totalFee
 from Dorm_AllFee a 
	inner join HR_Employee c on a.employeeId=c.id 
	left join HR_Department d on c.deptId=d.id 
    left join HR_Department e on d.parentId=e.id 
    left join HR_Position f on c.positionId=f.id 
	left join HR_Company g on c.orgId=g.id
	left join HR_Interim h on c.interimId=h.id 
where a.yearMonth=? 
order by d.id,h.id,a.id
